==== Notes ====

===== Video =====
Playing videos in Totem gives tearing. Out of the box glxgears leaves traces and bad performance. To fix this install
kernel 2.6.30rc3-generic and add the following to your /etc/X11/xorg.conf in the device section.

<pre>
Option          "AccelMethod"          "uxa" 
Option          "EXAOptimizeMigration" "true"
</pre>

It still doesn't fix the video tearing issues though.

intel driver 2.7.0 doesn't fix the tearing problem. Compiz is also affected by this.

===== Suspend =====
Suspend is broken. All open programs are closed when resuming.
